page.title: 18Employment
page.content: Many people in{Tintagel}are employed in jobs which are connected to the tourist industry.There are hotel workers (cooks,cleaners,waitresses, receptionists,office workers)people involved in the catering trade (restaurant and cafe workers,people working in public houses)people involved in making or selling souvenirs,other shopkeepers, and guides for the various historic buildings.Some people are employed on the farms in{Tintagel}and other manual workers in the area include builders, mechanics and council workers.People work for S.W.E.B.,S.W.Water Board, British Telecom and Fys Buses.There are also :Docters,Nurses,Teachers, bankers and Estate Agents.Unemployment rises in the winter because of the seasonal nature of many jobs.
